name: Horace the Sphere
description:
Horace's my name, rage's my game.

Spheres don't have legs (you don't say). But who needs them when you can roll and scrape your face against the ground? This sphere, Horace, must find and eat green spikes, for whatever reason, in the most peculiar places in the universe. Oh, and just to point out, he loves to fall of edges.
